meaningMnemonic: A <radical>scooter</radical> with a <radical>mohawk</radical>, now that's the most <kanji>suitable</kanji> hairstyle you could ever think of for a scooter!
readingMnemonic: You want this <kanji>suitable</kanji> hairstyle for your scooter too, and luckily you're a <reading>techie</reading> (てき), so it's easy for you to install one.
